alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:42PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN RAPIDES...NORTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS...EVANGELINE...EASTERN BEAUREGARD...NORTHWESTERN ACADIA...SOUTHEASTERN VERNON AND ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 730 PM CST... At 642 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elmer to Mittie to near Topsy. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Mamou, Welsh, Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Glenmora, Elton, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Fenton, Reeves, Dry Creek, Sugartown, Ragley, Hineston, Pitkin, Mittie, and Grant. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 54 and 62. Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and southwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Rapides; Vernon
